nodes.text: The Cron Supernova was a supernova that took place in the Cron Cluster. According to the Qel-Droma Epics, the supernova was triggered by the Sith Lord Naga Sadow, and the Jedi-controlled planet Ossus was devastated by the event.

The Cron Supernova was first canonically mentioned in the sourcebook Nexus of Power. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, the Cron Supernova first appeared in the comic book Tales of the Jedi – The Sith War 4, and it was triggered by Sith sorceress Aleema Keto, unwittingly boosted by Ulic Qel-Droma.
